section_summary: The text is a decree issued by the Ministry, referring to the Constitution and an Amiri Order appointing the Prime Minister. It appoints several individuals to various positions, including Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Interior, Minister of Defense, Minister of State for Cabinet Affairs and Minister of State for National Assembly Affairs, and Minister of State for Economic and Investment Affairs. The text also mentions the names of the individuals appointed. The text is part of the proceedings of the 17th legislative session, dated June 20, 2023.
